crew/astrid-alder.html.title: Astrid Alder
crew/astrid-alder.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 1 Rank:: Captain Species:: Human Role:: Commanding Officer
Portrait:: Note:: Sent to the Shackleton Expanse to act as a bridge builder to new peoples and civilizations. She carefully chose her crew for this purpose. Astrid Alder built a reputation in Starfleet as a First Contact specialist. She is a remarkable ability to keep contact open with new civilization and build bridges between them and the Federation.
Now, Captain Alder is assigned to the USS Hudson to form new alliances far away on the far side of the Klingon and Romulan empires, in the Shackleton Expanse. For this mission, she has hand picked members of her crew to handle a wide variety of scientific, military, and diplomatic situations.Value1:: Strength in diversity Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Captain Alder coached Verid Tiaun through a tense negotiation between a Federation colony and a Tzenkethi colony.
Robert H. Lodge is the XO and reports directly to Alder.
Astrid Morgan Statblock

Astrid Alder Log 1.1: Stardate - The Hudson was sent to investigate the disappearance of a Federation scouting vessel near the Bacchus system. Upon our arrival, the ship suffered a total power failure as it was hit by a massive subspace distortion wave. The wave itself is preventing all long-rong communications and warp travel. We're stranded.I've sent an away team down to Bacchus-3, an M-class planet with massive spires reaching into it's upper atmosphere. Scans show it to the the source of the subspace waves. The team has just re-established communication between the Hudson and the planet's surface. It seems the missing scout team is there studying the Spires. They were been able to open one of them and hopefully they've find a solution to our predicament sooner rather than later. Meanwhile, the crew on the Hudson has problems of it's own...
Astrid Alder Log 1.2: Stardate - I couldn't be more proud of my crew (to be continued...)
Astrid Alder Log 2: Stardate - I've sent my first officer, Commander Lodge, and Lieutenant Verid Tiaun on a few weeks of leave to the tropical getaway of the R'ongovia Protectorate.

crew/fitz.html.title: Fitz
crew/fitz.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Enlisted NumRank:: 6 Rank:: Senior Chief Petty Officer Species:: Caitian Role:: Transporter Chief
Portrait:: Note:: Old, jaded, and sarcastic. But also a wealth of experience and a reliable crew member. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Somewhat of a Yoda character to Verid Tiaun, giving short, wise advise that always seems to be the right call.
Both Fitz and Robert H. Lodge are enjoyers of craft beer, (a real luxury on a starship!)
Fitz helped Edon Jebrien through a transporter accident, advising patience as the problem got sorted out.

crew/jolepo.html.title: Jolepo
crew/jolepo.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lt. Commander Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Edosian Role:: Science Officer
Portrait::
Player:: Dan Note:: A xenobiologist with over a century of experience. Several other careers previously. Was a merchant on a starbase. Junior officer in a second career.Value1:: First Contact? Sign me up! Value2:: Every Puzzle has A Solution Value3:: Exploration is the blood that fills my veins. Value4:: There is no greater puzzle to solve than a person's mind.

crew/kyle-miller.html.title: Kyle Miller
crew/kyle-miller.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 7 Rank:: Ensign Species:: Human Role:: Security Specialist
Portrait::
Note:: A simple man from Indianapolis who constantly finds truth in Jolepo's wisdom. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Looks up to Jolepo, who seems to always have the perfect nuggest of wisdom for every situation.
Kyle Miller - Statblock

crew/nisha.html.title: Nisha
crew/nisha.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 5 Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Orion Role:: Navigator
Portrait::
Note:: An outlier in Starfleet due to their species and career rival to Edon Jebrien. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
A career rival to Edon Jebrien, with whom she competes for many of the same roles and positions.
Nisha - Statblock

crew/robert-h.-lodge.html.title: Robert  H. Lodge
crew/robert-h.-lodge.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 2 Rank:: Commander Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Human Role:: Executive Officer
Portrait::
Player:: John Note:: In his first role as XO and looking to prove himself as capable of command. Looking for ways to help around the shipValue1:: The Federation brings unity to chaos. Value2:: Every crewman is a part of the solution. Value3:: Take time to study the problem before rushing to conclusions. Value4:: Knowledge is a weapon use it wisely.
Jolepo is often frustrated with Robert's decision making process.
Both Verid and Robert H. Lodge are in leadership positions for the first time, and helped each other get there.
Encouraged Edon Jebriento sign up to Starfleet.
Both Robert and Roger Quincy have a love of American history.
During a first contact mission, the team lead got sick. Doctor T'Lor mentored Robert through the first contact process.
Both Robert and Fitz share a love of craft beer.

crew/roger-quincy.html.title: Roger Quincy
crew/roger-quincy.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 2 Rank:: Commander Species:: Human Role:: Chief Engineer
Portrait:: Note:: A religious man from Massachusetts with a love of American history. Member of the episcopal protestant denomination.Value1:: If it ain't broke, don't fix it. Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Loves to discuss American history with Robert H. Lodge.
Much like Edon Jebrien, Roger is from a religious household. The two of them have a shared understanding of what it means to be both Starfleet officers and religious servants.

crew/suvak.html.title: Suvak
crew/suvak.html.description:
Info Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lt Commander Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Vulcan Role:: Chief Medical Officer
Portrait:: Note:: A doctor with an aptitude for hands-on experience and security procedures. Isolated Colony: Sukav grew up on the Vulcan colony of Minora, a small agricultural planet. Sukav's parents were agronomists specializing in developing new crop strains. They valued the scientific method and knowledge of the world.Starfleet / Sciences Track: Sukav specialized in the Sciences Track (Medical). However during his time at Starfleet, he did rotations in Engineering and Security. To his surprise, he showed an aptitude for security work, and even found he enjoyed the work.Dealing with a Plague: Sukav was present for an outbreak of Omni-Viral Collapse Syndrome on the planet Jurisa. The syndrome, caused by the Intecinoma Marapisis virus, attacked multiple biological systems simultaneously causing the body to shut down leading to death. Sukav was assigned to the team studying the virus and eventually developing an effective vaccine.First Contact: During his rotation with the Security team, Sukav was part of the team that made first contact with the Ophrods, a humanoid Species from the Ophrod System in the Beta Quadrant. The Ophrodians are a materialistic species ruled by a council of corporate leaders. Sukav was part of the security team that escorted the Ophrodians while aboard ship. He helped smooth out a few different misunderstandings with the crew during the negotiations, sharpening his diplomacy skills.Value1:: Knowledge is the foundation of enlightenment. Value2:: Peace and Stability comes from knowledge of others. Value3:: Logic is the right tool for all situations. Value4:: A good mystery is irresistible

crew/t'lor.html.title: T'Lor
crew/t'lor.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Species:: Vulcan Role:: Ship Doctor
Portrait::
Note:: A doctor who previously mentored Robert H. Lodge through a first contact negotiation. She believes in spiritual qualities to space exploration, and was formerly lovers with Jolepo. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Formerly married to Jolepo decades ago.
When the team lead for a first contact mission got sick, T'Lot mentored Robert H. Lodge through the first contact diplomacy process.
Sometimes speaks to Edon Jebrien about the spiritual aspects of space travel.
T'Lor's Statblock

crew/tak.html.title: Tak
crew/tak.html.description:
Info Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 6 Pronouns they/them Rank:: Ensign Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Saurian Role:: Security Specialist
Portrait:: Note:: Nothing gets past their infrared eyes. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::

crew/tizia-sh'vollot.html.title: Tizia Sh'vollot
crew/tizia-sh'vollot.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 5 Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Andorian Role:: Junior Science Officer
Portrait:: Note:: Become an astrophysicist to avoid the political life lead by her diplomat parents. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Both Tizia and Verid Tiaun joined Starfleet to avoid a life of politics, like their diplomat parents.

crew/valerie.html.title: Valerie
crew/valerie.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Hudson Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lt Commander Species:: Human Role:: Ship Counsellor
Portrait:: Note:: Years spent living on a space station has prepared her as a ship counsellor for the Hudson's diverse crew. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Shares many similar experiences of living on a space station with Jolepo
Valerie - Statblock

crew/verid-tiaun.html.title: Verid Tiaun
crew/verid-tiaun.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: they/them Location:: USS Hudson NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Trill Role:: Ops Manager
Portrait::
Player:: Kelly
Note:: Went into engineering to avoid a diplomatic life, and came up into leadership positions with Robert H. Lodge and Edon Jebrien. Value1:: Space is big enough for all of us Value2:: Protect the ship to protect the crew Value3:: Listen to opposing viewpoints Value4:: Fix tomorrow's problems today
Jolepo is friends with Verid's twin joined sibling. They each know half of the same person. Jolepo and Verid also once helped each other survive a crash landing in an escape pod.
Both Verid and Robert H. Lodge are in leadership positions for the first time, and helped each other get there.
Both Verid and Tizia Sh'vollot have parents who were previously diplomats. They joined Starfleet to get away from a life of politics.
Captain Astrid Alder helped Verid through treaty negotiation "xenkethy" people colony disagreement
Fitz is often a wise mentor "yoda-like" character to Verid
Verid and Edon Jebrienwere classmates in Starfleet Academy. They were Gravity Tennis players together. They work well together because Edon is very familiar wit the way Verid likes to tune engines.

sessions/logs/astrid-alder-log-1.1.html.title: Astrid Alder Log 1.1
sessions/logs/astrid-alder-log-1.1.html.description:
Session:: Hudson Log 1.1 - Arrival at Bacchus-3
Character:: Astrid Alder Stardate:: 5428.8Log:: The Hudson was sent to investigate the disappearance of a Federation scouting vessel near the Bacchus system. Upon our arrival, the ship suffered a total power failure as it was hit by a massive subspace distortion wave. The wave itself is preventing all long-rong communications and warp travel. We're stranded.I've sent an away team down to Bacchus-3, an M-class planet with massive spires reaching into it's upper atmosphere. Scans show it to the the source of the subspace waves. The team has just re-established communication between the Hudson and the planet's surface. It seems the missing scout team is there studying the Spires. They were been able to open one of them and hopefully they've find a solution to our predicament sooner rather than later. Meanwhile, the crew on the Hudson has problems of it's own...

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-0.html.title: Hudson Log 0
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-0.html.description: Note:: The crew of the USS Hudson is recruited and prepared for duty (and friendship!)

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-1.1-arriva.title: Hudson Log 1.1 - Arrival at Bacchus-3
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-1.1-arriva.description:
You can join one of my Mothership one shots for free! This month's One Shot Special is Mothership! A Mothership One Shot *100 years ago, the American Oil and Fuel Corporation bankrupted itself to send a doomed space mission to the planet Mercury. A century later, deep surface scans show an impossible petroleum compound hidden under the crust of Mercury, dubbed "dragobenzine". You have been hired to survey and break ground on a new mining operation that promises to unlock interstellar travel for humanity using this new fuel source. This historic return to the Scorched Planet will also answer a century old mystery: Why did the oil and fuel corp throw everything away to get here, and why did they never return?* Content advisory! Fire, Mutilation, Body Horror, Character Death, Death, Demons, Mind alteration, Self-Harm, Violence, Cults These one shot specials are FREE for any player in an active ongoing campaign. Others can join at the listed price. You can also always invite a friend and give them your referral code and you BOTH get $10 credit on SPG.Stardate:: 5428.8
Mission:: Bacchus-3
Note:: The USS Hudson arrived Bacchus-3, falling victim to a total power failure tripped by a massive subspace distortion. The subspace waves prevent long range communication and warp travel. They were found to be originated on Bacchus-3. An away team was put together to investigate the planet and hopefully deactivate whatever is causing the waves. On the planet, several Federation members were found, studying massive monoliths reaching into the upper atmosphere. The Hudson's away team was able to open a door on the monolith, revealing passageways inside.

headers.heading: Feb 28 @ 10am EST JOIN HERE

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-1.2-bacchu.title: Hudson Log 1.2 - Bacchus' Irresistible Call
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-1.2-bacchu.description: Thing Stardate:: 5428.8 Mission:: Bacchus-3 Note:: The Hudson's away team managed to deactivate the subspace distortion wave using the control room inside one of Bacchus' spires. Meanwhile, a Klingon Bird of Prey, The IKR Ya'Leth, fell out of warp completely deactivated much like the Hudson before.Deactivating the subspace wave triggers a security response, and the machinery in the planet began to rip apart the other planets in the solar system. The Hudson's crew assisted the Ya'Leth to eject their warp core, now resonating with the same subspace distortions as the planet.After escaping the Bacchus system, astronomers watched in horror and amazement as the entire Bacchus-3 system pulled itself apart, pulling inwards towards a singularity, and disappeared.

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-2-orion-he.title: Hudson Log 2 - Orion Heist
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-2-orion-he.description: Stardate:: 5557.6 Mission:: The Orion Heist Note:: Admiral Banna Stoker sent the crew of the USS Hudson to recover a stolen Tilikaal artifact. The crew tracked the artifact down to the SS Tardigrade, an Orion trade ship, and convinced them to hand over the artifact before their Romulan liaison arrived. Back on Narendra Station, Admiral Stoker took the artifact to study further.

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-3-phantoms.title: Hudson Log 3 - Phantoms Adrift
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-3-phantoms.description: Stardate:: 5591.2 Mission:: Phantoms Adrift Note:: While delivering an encrypted message from Captain Alder to Captain Skaarsen, a trusted friend of Alder's, Commander Lodge and Lieutenant Tiaun encountered an 50 year old derelict Starfleet starship drifting out of on ion Nebula. There, an unknown species attempted to escape the wreckage by disguising themselves as copies of Lodge and Tiaun. The two real officers escaped the derelict ship and delivered the message, leaving a report with Starfleet to take care of the derelict ship and the strange entities there.

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-4.1-the-pa.title: Hudson Log 4.1 - The Pasqual Problem
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-4.1-the-pa.description: Stardate:: 5697.6 Mission:: Simplicity Note:: While preparing to perform a deep space scan of the Shackleton Expanse, the Hudson encountered a starfleet shuttle with Admiral Bana Stoker on board. Stoker ordered the Hudson to head directly towards the Pasqual system, which had previously been unscanned. There, an away team was sent to investigate Pasqual-1, an M-class planet with a thick electromagnetic field surrounding it.The planet was inhabited by a variety of intelligent humanoid people that appear to be of many different species, but without any sort of advanced technology. The away team, led by Commander Lodge and joined by Jolepo, Verid, Doctor Suvak, and Ensign Tak avoided contact with the locals. They got beamed off the planet after 24 hours with film photographs and recorded observations.

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-4.2-the-pa.title: Hudson Log 4.2 - The Pasqual Problem
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-4.2-the-pa.description:
Please make an account on The Forge (link in discord channel). Let me know if you have any difficulties with the new tools! Try rolling on a couple character sheets and the ship Look in the "Journals" tab in the top right. Check out the mission logs format and some of the other notes. Find your character token on the ship rooms page and try moving them around a bit! Test out some of the macros. There's a couple techobabble macros and one for using the "fire" action in ship combat! I feel the following supporting characters are eligible for advancement! If I've forgotten someone who deserves it, please nominate them! Tak - @ Kelly
Roger Quincy @ John
Astrid Alder @ Dan
Kyle Miller @ Jeff Each of these characters can do one of the following (take note of which one you choose): Add a new Value (up to four times) Increase an attribute by 1 (one time only) Increase a department by 1 (one time only) Add a new focus (up to three times) Add a new Talent (up to four times) Supporting Character advancement is on page 146 (also below). Supporting characters can also be advanced further using your Milestones.
Stardate:: 5697.6
Mission:: Simplicity Note:: The Hudson was attacked by a Klingon D7 battle cruiser, which demanded custody of Admiral Stoker. The Hudson barely managed to avoid any serious harm before disabling the Klingon ship. Captain Astrid Alder attempted to liaison with the Klingons, but they demanded death in combat and would not surrender. Commander Lodge and Doctor Suvok convinced the Klingon Captain to let them on board to tend to their wounded, based on giving the Klingons a fair fight.Back on the Hudson, Lt. Cmdr. Jolepo and Lt. Verid refitted an atmospheric probe to enter the electromagnetic field of Pasqual-1. While performing a sensor sweep of the obelisk there, the probe was uploaded with thousands of years of genetic survey results. Each survey was paired was an "genetic advancement attempt", the results and purpose of which are still unclear.

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-5-aboard-t.title: Hudson Log 5 - Aboard the Klingon Ship
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-5-aboard-t.description: Thing Stardate:: 5697.6 Mission:: Simplicity Note:: Sukav, Robert Lodge, Valerie, and Tak beamed aboard the IKR Ya'leth on the pretense of offering medical aid. Their real mission was to figure out what the Klingons wanted with Admiral Stoker. The Klingon crew members seemed to be as irritated and confused about the situation as the crew of the Hudson. Their captain had kept the purpose of their mission secret, much like Admiral Stoker. However, the captain of the Klingon ship was soon forced to admit he and Stoker were after a weapon of incredible power. As the Klingon Crew mutinied, the Hudson away team left to confront Stoker. The Admiral ordered the Hudson to destroy the Klingon ship, but captain Astrid Alder had Stoker arrested instead.
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-5-aboard-t.sourcePath: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Hudson/Sessions/Summaries/Hudson Log 5 - Aboard the Klingon Ship.md

sessions/summaries/hudson-log-6-border-d.title: Hudson Log 6 - Border Dispute
sessions/summaries/hudson-log-6-border-d.description: Thing Stardate:: 5764.8 Mission:: Border Dispute Note:: The USS Hudson was summoned to rescue the USS Nightingale, a Federation science vessel which had drifted unexpectedly into the neutral zone. There, a Romulan bird of prey was claiming the crewmembers as prisoners of war. The Hudson quickly engaged the Romulan warbird and nearly disabled it while an evacuation team attempted to get survivors off the Nightingale. In the end, a Romulan disguised as a Vulcan, named T'lek attempted to return to the bird of prey but was fired upon. When T'lek sought refuge on the Hudson, they were quickly found to be a spy and arrested. It's still unclear what information T'lek was trying to give to the Romulans.

uss-hudson.html.title: USS Hudson
uss-hudson.html.description:
Summary Location:: Shackleton Expanse
Portrait:: Note:: The NCC-7832: A exploration and diplomatic exchange ship set to explore the Shackleton Expanse.
A Federation Cardenas Class starship commanded by Astrid Alder. Federation Starship Cardenas Class Dependable Workhorse The USS Hudson has been assigned to explore the Shackleton Expanse on the far side of the Klingon and Romulan empires. With hopes of finding much needed allies in the Expanse, Captain Astrid Morgan has selected a diverse crew of people from the Federation and beyond. The USS Hudson will be based out of Narendra Station, a deep space research station jointly run by Starfleet and the Klingon Empire.
Hudson Log 0: Stardate - The crew of the USS Hudson is recruited and prepared for duty (and friendship!)
Hudson Log 1.1 - Arrival at Bacchus-3: Stardate 5428.8
The USS Hudson arrived Bacchus-3, falling victim to a total power failure tripped by a massive subspace distortion. The subspace waves prevent long range communication and warp travel. They were found to be originated on Bacchus-3. An away team was put together to investigate the planet and hopefully deactivate whatever is causing the waves. On the planet, several Federation members were found, studying massive monoliths reaching into the upper atmosphere. The Hudson's away team was able to open a door on the monolith, revealing passageways inside.
Hudson Log 1.2 - Bacchus' Irresistible Call: Stardate 5428.8 The Hudson's away team managed to deactivate the subspace distortion wave using the control room inside one of Bacchus' spires. Meanwhile, a Klingon Bird of Prey, The IKR Ya'Leth, fell out of warp completely deactivated much like the Hudson before.Deactivating the subspace wave triggers a security response, and the machinery in the planet began to rip apart the other planets in the solar system. The Hudson's crew assisted the Ya'Leth to eject their warp core, now resonating with the same subspace distortions as the planet.After escaping the Bacchus system, astronomers watched in horror and amazement as the entire Bacchus-3 system pulled itself apart, pulling inwards towards a singularity, and disappeared.
Hudson Log 2 - Orion Heist: Stardate 5557.6 Admiral Banna Stoker sent the crew of the USS Hudson to recover a stolen Tilikaal artifact. The crew tracked the artifact down to the SS Tardigrade, an Orion trade ship, and convinced them to hand over the artifact before their Romulan liaison arrived. Back on Narendra Station, Admiral Stoker took the artifact to study further.
Hudson Log 3 - Phantoms Adrift: Stardate 5591.2 While delivering an encrypted message from Captain Alder to Captain Skaarsen, a trusted friend of Alder's, Commander Lodge and Lieutenant Tiaun encountered an 50 year old derelict Starfleet starship drifting out of on ion Nebula. There, an unknown species attempted to escape the wreckage by disguising themselves as copies of Lodge and Tiaun. The two real officers escaped the derelict ship and delivered the message, leaving a report with Starfleet to take care of the derelict ship and the strange entities there.
Hudson Log 4.1 - The Pasqual Problem: Stardate 5697.6 While preparing to perform a deep space scan of the Shackleton Expanse, the Hudson encountered a starfleet shuttle with Admiral Bana Stoker on board. Stoker ordered the Hudson to head directly towards the Pasqual system, which had previously been unscanned. There, an away team was sent to investigate Pasqual-1, an M-class planet with a thick electromagnetic field surrounding it.The planet was inhabited by a variety of intelligent humanoid people that appear to be of many different species, but without any sort of advanced technology. The away team, led by Commander Lodge and joined by Jolepo, Verid, Doctor Suvak, and Ensign Tak avoided contact with the locals. They got beamed off the planet after 24 hours with film photographs and recorded observations.
Hudson Log 4.2 - The Pasqual Problem: Stardate 5697.6 The Hudson was attacked by a Klingon D7 battle cruiser, which demanded custody of Admiral Stoker. The Hudson barely managed to avoid any serious harm before disabling the Klingon ship. Captain Astrid Alder attempted to liaison with the Klingons, but they demanded death in combat and would not surrender. Commander Lodge and Doctor Suvok convinced the Klingon Captain to let them on board to tend to their wounded, based on giving the Klingons a fair fight.Back on the Hudson, Lt. Cmdr. Jolepo and Lt. Verid refitted an atmospheric probe to enter the electromagnetic field of Pasqual-1. While performing a sensor sweep of the obelisk there, the probe was uploaded with thousands of years of genetic survey results. Each survey was paired was an "genetic advancement attempt", the results and purpose of which are still unclear.
Hudson Log 5 - Aboard the Klingon Ship: Stardate 5697.6 Sukav, Robert Lodge, Valerie, and Tak beamed aboard the IKR Ya'leth on the pretense of offering medical aid. Their real mission was to figure out what the Klingons wanted with Admiral Stoker. The Klingon crew members seemed to be as irritated and confused about the situation as the crew of the Hudson. Their captain had kept the purpose of their mission secret, much like Admiral Stoker. However, the captain of the Klingon ship was soon forced to admit he and Stoker were after a weapon of incredible power. As the Klingon Crew mutinied, the Hudson away team left to confront Stoker. The Admiral ordered the Hudson to destroy the Klingon ship, but captain Astrid Alder had Stoker arrested instead.
Hudson Log 6 - Border Dispute: Stardate 5764.8 The USS Hudson was summoned to rescue the USS Nightingale, a Federation science vessel which had drifted unexpectedly into the neutral zone. There, a Romulan bird of prey was claiming the crewmembers as prisoners of war. The Hudson quickly engaged the Romulan warbird and nearly disabled it while an evacuation team attempted to get survivors off the Nightingale. In the end, a Romulan disguised as a Vulcan, named T'lek attempted to return to the bird of prey but was fired upon. When T'lek sought refuge on the Hudson, they were quickly found to be a spy and arrested. It's still unclear what information T'lek was trying to give to the Romulans. The Hudson is equipped with dozens of shuttles. Some notable ones are listed below!

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_showCustomIcons.description: Show custom icons for files and folders

info_showDefaultFolderIcons.description: Show a default icon of a folder for every folder in the tree

info_showDefaultFileIcons.description: Show a default icon of a file for every file in the tree

info_defaultFolderIcon.description: The icon to use for folders. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultFileIcon.description: The icon to use for files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultMediaIcon.description: The icon to use for media files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_exposeStartingPath.description: Whether or not to show the current file in the file tree when the page is first loaded

info_minCollapseDepth.description: Only allow outline items to be collapsed if they are at least this many levels deep in the tree.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded

info_siteUrl.description: The url that this site will be hosted at

info_siteName.description: The name of the vault / exported site

info_authorName.description: The name of the author of the site
